block.name: Message Sink
block.doc: Creates messages from an incoming data stream. Message passing is the mechanism that allows data to flow between the Python and C++ layers of GNU Radio.

param.name: Input Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input stream.

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
